title: Generate a Certification Document
description: An engineer needs to prepare a document for the FAA demonstrating that a new avionics system complies with DO-178C standards.

tasks.description: Gather all software requirements, design documents, and test results for the avionics system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles all necessary supporting documents.

tasks.description: Use a template to generate the compliance report, mapping each requirement to its corresponding design and test case.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a complete traceability matrix and compliance report.

tasks.description: Submit the report to the internal certification authority for review before sending it to the FAA.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent follows the correct procedure for internal review.
